name: Performapal Lebellman
text: Once per turn: You can declare a Level from 1 to 5, then target 1 other "Performapal" monster you control; until the end of this turn, reduce this card's Level by the declared Level, and if you do, increase the Level or the other monster by the same amount.
pendulum_text: Once per turn: You can increase the Levels of all Pendulum Summoned monsters you currently control by 1 (even if this card leaves the field).
